e.dn: Ca 3 Sm 3 A 9 N 17 )a nd Ca 3 Yb 3 A 9 N 17 ) Nitridosilicates with Interpenetrating Nets that Consist of Star-Shaped (N (4) A 3 ) 4 ) Units and (Si 5 N 16 ) Supertetrahedra
e.d: Abstract: New nitridosilicates Ca 3 Sm 3 -ACHTUNGRE[Si 9 N 17 ] and Ca 3 Yb 3 ACHTUNGRE[Si 9 N 17 ] were syn-thesized from the reactions of the puremetals (calcium and samarium/ytterbi-um) with silicon diimide “Si(NH) 2 ”ina radio-frequency (rf) furnace at tem-peratures of up to 16508C. These iso-typic compounds crystallize in thecubic space groupP4¯3m (no. 215) withlattice parameters a=739.50(3) pm;V=0.4044(1) nm 3 ; Z=1; wR 2 =0.029(240 diffraction data, 26 parameters)for Ca 3 Sm 3 ACHTUNGRE[Si 9 N 17 ] and a=730.20(2) pm; V=0.3893(1) nm 3 ; wR 2 =0.039 (387 diffraction data, 27 parame-ters) for Ca 3 Yb 3 ACHTUNGRE[Si 9 N 17 ]. The new struc-ture type of Ca 3 RE 3 ACHTUNGRE[Si 9 N 17 ](RE=Sm,Yb) consists of two independent infi-ACHTUNGREnite networks, each of which have anexpanded sphalerite (ZnS) topology inwhich the positions of the Zn and Satoms are replaced by voluminous[N [4] ACHTUNGRE(SiN 3 ) 4 ] units and [Si 5 N 16 ] superte-trahedra, respectively, thereby display-ing twofold interpenetration. e.dn: Dispositif électroluminescent comprenant un matériau à base de sialon qui émet dans le vert
e.d: L'invention concerne un dispositif electroluminescent, notamment une DEL, qui comprend un materiau qui emet dans le vert de composition Sr5-y-z-aMySi23-x,Al3+xOx+2aN37-x- 2a:Euz :Cez1. Il a ete decouvert que ce materiau presente une emission etroite dans la plage de longueurs d'onde vertes, ainsi qu'une bonne capacite de production et une bonne stabilite.
